metadata.feature_description: Navigate through paginated list of users with configurable page sizes

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Users and observe the default page size
steps.actual: Page size dropdown shows '10' as the default value, and user list displays 10 users per page

steps.action: With 15 users in the system (page size 10), click the Next page button
steps.expected: User list should navigate to page 2 showing remaining 5 users
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2, showing users 11-15 (testuser06 through testuser10)

steps.action: From page 2, click the Previous page button
steps.expected: User list should navigate back to page 1 showing first 10 users
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to page 1, showing the first 10 users

steps.action: Click the Last page button to jump to the last page
steps.expected: User list should jump directly to the last page
steps.actual: Successfully jumped to page 2 (last page) showing users 11-15

steps.action: Click the First page button to jump back to page 1
steps.expected: User list should jump directly to the first page
steps.actual: Successfully jumped back to page 1 showing the first 10 users

steps.action: Click the page size dropdown to view available options
steps.expected: Dropdown should show page size options (10, 25, 50, 100 per requirements)
steps.actual: Dropdown shows two options: 10 and 25. Options 50 and 100 are not available in the UI

steps.expected: User list should display up to 25 users per page
steps.actual: Page size changed to 25, all 15 users now displayed on a single page

steps.action: Observe the pagination summary text showing total user count
steps.expected: Summary should display total number of users
steps.actual: Summary text displays '15 users' total count correctly

steps.action: On page 1, verify Previous and First buttons are disabled
steps.expected: Previous and First page buttons should be disabled on page 1
steps.actual: First and Previous buttons appear inactive/disabled when on page 1

steps.action: On last page (page 2), verify Next and Last buttons are disabled
steps.expected: Next and Last page buttons should be disabled on the last page
steps.actual: Next and Last buttons appear inactive/disabled when on last page

steps.action: Navigate through pages and observe the page indicator
steps.expected: Page indicator should show current page number
steps.actual: Page indicator correctly shows '1' on page 1 and '2' on page 2

steps.action: Navigate to page 2, then change the filter from 'Authorized' to 'All'
steps.expected: Pagination should reset to page 1 when filter is changed
steps.actual: Filter changed successfully. Code confirms pageIndex is set to 0 and resetIndex is set to true on filter change. User list content shows page 1 users after filter change.

observations: Page size options in UI are limited to 10 and 25. The suggested test scenarios mentioned 50 and 100 options, but these are not available in the current implementation.
The Pager component from @dnnsoftware/dnn-react-common handles the pagination UI. The page size options are likely configured at the component level rather than in this specific module.
Code review confirmed that onFilterChange method correctly resets pageIndex to 0 and sets resetIndex to true, ensuring pagination resets when filters are applied.
Created 12 test users (testuser01 through testuser12) plus existing host and admin users to have sufficient data (15 users) to properly test pagination with page size of 10.
